name: Somnium (itch) (Digitrah)
description:
In this psychological thriller you are a lone prisoner sentenced to work on an isolated space station. However, the extreme passing of time starts to deteriorate your mental stability. Struggling to separate dreams from reality, your imprisoned existence spirals into a cascade of dreadful events as your own mind becomes your worst enemy.

This 6-week student project was made as a collaboration between multiple people - not just by myself! This is simply the end result.

Created with Unreal Engine 4, and voiced in English.

Project Members:

- Leonard B. Kristoffersen, Project Lead, Level Designer and Environment Artist

- Martin Ofoghi, Product Owner, Programmer and Environment Artist

- Simen Wiig, Programmer

- Håvard Fiskum, Programmer and Animator

- Benjamin Lillebekk, Voice Actor

- Torbjørn Svendsen, Sound Design

- Maren Holm, Sound Design

- Natasha Arthur, Story & Script

- Julie Bendiksen, Story & Script
